body.name: Comix Lined Journal Notebooks - 6 Pack Hardcover A5 Size Notebook, College Ruled Notebook for Writing, 6 Colors Journals for Women Men, 196 Pages, 5.7 inches x 8.3 i nches
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 21 mins
features: Pack of 6: With 6 journals in each pack, you'll have plenty of writing space to last you a while.
Convenient Size: With a portable A5 size of 5.7 inches x 8 inches, these notebooks can easily fit into a backpack or briefcase, so you can take it with you wherever you go.

Complete with Extras: Inside the journal, you'll find a convenient inner pocket for storing loose papers or notes. And a ribbon bookmark is the perfect addition to any writer, student or professional's toolkit, and ensures that you never lose your place and can easily pick up where you left off.

Versatile Journal: The college-ruled pages make these journals perfect for students, professionals, artists, or anyone who loves to write, draw, take note, journaling, or even doodling. It can handle all of their writing and creative needs.

Assorted Colors: The pack of 6 includes navy blue, red, yellow, green, sky blue, and pink, so you can choose the color that suits your style. Order now and start capturing your thoughts and ideas in style!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Wanted varying colors to give to group members for meeting notes. Arrived overnight & good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this notebook set. I like the different colors, the feel of the cover, the pages look great and are nice and sturdy. It's easy to write on, easy to use, easy to carry around, it's a nice set of journal notebooks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this style of notebook and use them often for kits for my customers. In this case, the variety of colors were perfect for my needs.The value here is great. The journals are well made and sturdy. The paper is bleed proof and doesn't easily tear. These are simply high quality products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great set of notebooks/journals. I am no longer a student, but I would find these too small to use for school notebooks, but there are so many possibilities: journaling, creative writing, general notes, and more.The color selection is as pictured in the description-- each notebook is distinct, but there are no additional surprise colors other than what is pictured. This might be obvious, but similar packs often have random colors, so I wanted to specify that this is not the case.Each notebook has some nifty features: a band to keep the notebook closed and a bookmark. Both of these items are color coded to each notebook, which is great for people who like things that match. There's also a little paper pocket folder in the back of each notebook.Overall, I think this is a great set of notebooks, and I am enjoying filling them up with my Duolingo vocabulary, among other things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good value for money; ink doesn't bleed through; covers seem sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Decent journal notebooks, in a convenient size. I like the colors because I have different notebooks for different activities, and the colors make it easy to pick out which is which. The paper is heavy enough so ink doesn't bleed through the pages (at least if you're using gel pens, which are my preference -- I don't know how it would hold up to fountain pens, etc).The way the binding is constructed means that the first and last pages are attached to the front and back covers in a way that makes them not "turn" exactly like the other pages (it's a little difficult to describe, but also only a very small inconvenience -- all the other pages are just fine).I haven't used them much, but so far they seem like they'll be durable, at least under ordinary circumstances.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for people who does a lot of Journal writing
reviews.reviewText: Great for people who does a lot of Journal writing, Good for meeting and note taking. Material on cover is nice. Perfect size for larger purses or backpacks. Pages are glued in well, doesn't separate when turning page. Have electric strip to mark you place. Good valve for 6 notebooks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn’t recommend this
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Can’t even fold the page on the first page so I can write down comfortably, like wise the last bunch of pages.The book is very beautiful and aesthetic though just poorly made.
